entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and risk of freezing rain. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
